column1: Set the minimum number of bottles needed to activate the Hillebrand Gori eShipping shipping option on the checkout page
column2: Set the minimum number of bottles needed to activate the Hillebrand Gori eShipping shipping option on the checkout page

column1: Set the minimum number of days needed to prepare the parcels and make them ready for pickup
column2: Set the minimum number of days needed to prepare the parcels and make them ready for pickup

column1: Select the working days of your company. The selected days will be used to calculate the preparation time and the delivery time.
column2: Select the working days of your company. The selected days will be used to calculate the preparation time and the delivery time.

column1: Set the minimum hour when the carrier can pick the parcels
column2: Set the minimum hour when the carrier can pick the parcels

column2: Set the maximum hour when the carrier can pick the parcels

column1: Displays the duties and taxes estimation on the checkout page if you choose the "At the recipient's expense" option (domestic international shipments)
column2: Displays the duties and taxes estimation on the checkout page if you choose the "At the recipient's expense" option (domestic international shipments)

column1: Select yes if you are registered on the European One Stop Shop, a portal used to register purchases for European consumers and pay the VAT of the destination country. If you exceed 10,000 EUR in online sales, you are required to register on this portal, otherwise you invoice the private individual with VAT as if he had come to buy the goods at your premises. For more information, ask your accountant.
column2: Select yes if you are registered on the European One Stop Shop, a portal used to register purchases for European consumers and pay the VAT of the destination country. If you exceed 10,000 EUR in online sales, you are required to register on this portal, otherwise you invoice the private individual with VAT as if he had come to buy the goods at your premises. For more information, ask your accountant.

column1: Number needed to send to non-EU countries. It often corresponds to the country code followed by the VAT number. To request this code, you need to apply to your local customs agency.
column2: Number needed to send to non-EU countries. It often corresponds to the country code followed by the VAT number. To request this code, you need to apply to your local customs agency.

column1: Number issued by the US Food and Drugs Adminstration and used to identify any company, domestic or foreign, shipping human/animal foodstuffs to the US. This number is required to ship these types of goods to the USA. For assistance on how to obtain the number, please contact us.
column2: Number issued by the US Food and Drugs Adminstration and used to identify any company, domestic or foreign, shipping human/animal foodstuffs to the US. This number is required to ship these types of goods to the USA. For assistance on how to obtain the number, please contact us.

column2: If you choose "Yes", all shipments will be insured with a minimum amount of 5 � (may vary depending on the total price of the products)
